column1: Funeral services will be held on Friday
column4: 1:00 P.M. at the Parson Mortuary with Pastor John A. Young officiating.  Burial will follow at the Gardens of Memory Cemetery north of Muncie.  Friends may call at the Parson Mortuary on Thursday
column6: 2015 from 4:00 P.M. until 7:00 P.M. and again on Friday
